section.name: Amazon Simple Storage Service Datastores
section.p: DataNucleus supports persisting/retrieving objects to/from Amazon Simple Storage Service (using the datanucleus-json plugin). Simply specify your connection details as follows
You then create your PMF/EMF as normal and use JDO/JPA as normal.
Things to bear in mind with Amazon S3 usage :-

ul.li: Querying can be performed using JDOQL or JPQL. Any filtering/ordering will be performed in-memory
